get.summary: Gets a list of files in a directory or the content of a file.
get.description:
If the specified filepath is a directory, gets a list of the contained files.

If the specified filepath is a file, gets the file content.

If the file path contains GLOB characters a listing will be performed.

When 'metadata' parameter is set to true, return results will include the file/directory metadata.

parameters.name: filePath
parameters.description: Specifies the target file path in the user home directory.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit of rows to be listed. Must be a positive integer value. When not set, all rows are returned.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset of first entry in the requested list. Must be a non-negative integer value. When not set, the default offset value is 0.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Specifies the sorting of returned files by attribute. Possible values: 'fileName', 'lastModifiedTime', 'size'.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Specifies the order of returned files. Possible values: 'ASC' or 'DESC'.

parameters.name: transferMode
parameters.description: Specifies the file transfer mode. Possible values: 'ASCII' or 'BINARY'.

parameters.name: metadata
parameters.description:
When 'true' returns metadata of directory or file.

When 'false' and filepath leads to a file, then the file will be downloaded.

parameters.name: showdots
parameters.description: Specifies whether or not to display hidden files and folders (starting with a dot).

put.summary: Updates the metadata of selected file or directory.
put.description:
Updates metadata of file or directory specified by target file path.
You can rename a target file or directory when you set a value for **'newFilePath'** different than the value of **'fileName'**.

parameters.name: filePath
parameters.description: Specifies the target file path in the user home directory.

requestBody.description: The new file metadata to update.

post.summary: Uploads file in target file path or creates file/directory specified by the file path.
post.description: Uploads file or creates file/directory in target file path, depending on selected Content-Type header and request body information.

parameters.name: filePath
parameters.description: Specifies the target file path in the user home directory.

parameters.name: transferMode
parameters.description: Specifies the file transfer mode. Possible values: 'ASCII' or 'BINARY'.

delete.description: Deletes the target file or directory, specified by file path.

parameters.name: filePath
parameters.description: Specifies the target file path in the user home directory.

patch.summary: Partially updates metadata for specific filepath.
patch.description:
Partially updates metadata for a specific file or directory.
It can be used to share/unshare a directory by modifying **'sharedDirectoryProperties'**.
It can be also used to rename/move file by adding a **'newFilePath'**. Check the example below.

parameters.name: filePath
parameters.description: Specifies the target file path in the user home directory.

requestBody.description: Metadata to be updated for target file path.

skin.pattern: ^((Default HTML Template)|(Axway Jelly Ball 9)|(Axway Box and Stripe in Blue)|(ST Web Client)|(SecureTransport Legacy Client))$

htmlTemplateFolderPath.pattern: ^((Default HTML Template)|(Axway Jelly Ball 9)|(Axway Box and Stripe in Blue)|(ST Web Client)|(SecureTransport Legacy Client))$
